entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • iOS: Grid does not resize content when parent is hidden #28614
  • Update WindowsAppSDK to 1.7 #28613
  • RealParent of StackLayout has been Garbage Collected #28608
  • Dynamic Theme Changes Not Applying Properly with VisualStateManager #28606
    Backlog
  • EmptyViewTemplate Does Not Apply HeightRequest and WidthRequest, Causing Header and Footer to Be Invisible in CV2 #28605
  • Footer Not Displayed at the Bottom When EmptyView is Active in CV2 #28604
  • UnityView control #28602
    Backlog

Closed

  • [Windows] ListView cannot bind to ObservableCollection<System.Type> #16911
    Backlog
  • The fixed size grid row does not change size on the visibility change #14853
    Backlog
  • All first-level headings in the Table View Demo App page are centered on the iOS platform. #28154
    Backlog
  • All sub-titles on the Table View Demo App page are inconsistent on iOS, Android, and Windows platforms #28158
    Backlog
  • [Bug] iOS: CollectionView items don't change their size when item content size is changed #25650
    .NET 9 SR6
  • [CollectionView] Review Strategies to reduce Child Measure Propagation #25391
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • On iOS, ScrollView with MaximumWidthRequest does not limit the maximum width of its contents #21950
    Backlog
  • Trackpad horizontal scroll permanently locks scrolling axis in MAUI WebView #28131
  • SwipeItem inside custom Flyout does not fire command on iOS #20729
  • Reenable flaky UI test VerifyInitialEntryReturnTypeChange #27778
    .NET 9 SR7
  • MAUI MSAL authentication On Loginpage Back button is not visible. #28603
  • Inserting Item at index 0 in a collection view with ItemsUpdatingScrollMode="KeepScrollOffset", results in weird animation. #20806
    Backlog
  • Mac VS Code no hot reloead #28598

PullRequests

Created

  • Shell - Propagate BackButtonBehaviorProperty #28615
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [net10.0] Merge main to net10 #28611
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [iOS] CollectionView footer sizing when source is empty - fix #28610
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [net10.0] Update net10.0 preview3 sdk/iOS/Android/runtime/aspnet #28609
    area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [iOS] Fixed Shell.SearchHandler ClearPlaceholderIcon Color Issue #28601
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #28612
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 5 #28583
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Align the Sender between the gestures when emit the events #28305
    area-gestures
  • [Improvement] Add ReturnType API for SearchBar #24906
    t/enhancement ☀️, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Update default value for LineHeight in the ToNSAttributedString method #28027
    t/breaking 💥, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-controls-label, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Testing] Implemented InteractivePopGesture #28577
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Improve iOS CollectionView performance by leveraging the new platform level invalidation mechanism #28225
    p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, t/perf, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fix for border color of the RadioButton is visible in Windows #28214
    community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr5] [ci] Don't use the short url for install script #28607
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr5] [iOS] Back-navigation with swipe-back navigates back twice - fix #28594
    area-navigation
  • Fixed Test case failure in PR 28560 #28584
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, test-flight
  • [Testing] - Fix for flaky UITests related to the virtual keyboard in Android and iOS platforms #27876
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Obsolete ListView and Cell types #28500
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-listview, .NET 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • [Android] Picker - focus/unfocus events #28122
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [iOS] Inherit AccessibilityTraits for views wrapped inside a WrapperView #27088
    platform/iOS 🍎, do-not-merge, community ✨, area-controls-general, t/a11y, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Testing] Move Android UITests to run on Linux #28513
    area-testing
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-webview, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Windows] Fix tab colors not updating on add/remove #17591
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-shell, stale, t/desktop
  • [iOS] Trigger OnNavigatedTo method when hide the nav bar and using swipe gesture #27186
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR7
  • [2025/03/24] Candidate - In Flight Branch #28560
    p/0, area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR6
  • Implements `SecureStorage.GetOrSetAsync(key, value?)` (for #27966) #28565
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • Skip initial assignments in property mapper (take 4) #27042
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-architecture, community ✨, t/perf
  • [Housekeeping] Controls sample navigation crash - fix #28069
    area-navigation, t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix for FlyoutItem in overflow menu not fully interactable #27575
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fixed memory leak with PopToRootAsync when using TitleView #28547
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-titleview, t/perf, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android & iOS] - Fixed Entry and Editor from Accepting Input Values While Hidden. #27340
    community ✨, area-controls-entry, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • Skip useless handler mappings calls while connecting #27259
    community ✨, area-core-platform, .NET 9 SR7
  • Fix for Try scrolling down and when new items are added the first item does not kept in the displayed list. #27153
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Cleanup of `AccessibilityExtensions` #27052
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, .NET 9 SR7
  • Adding some copilot instructions #27864
    area-infrastructure
  • Update gradle version for AndroidNative app from 7.6.1 to 8.10.2. #27859
    area-infrastructure, community ✨
  • Investigating things for easier Aspire integration #24365
    t/breaking 💥, area-core-hosting, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Fixed FlyoutMenu icon issue when clearing and adding items #28241
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Add Binding.ConverterCulture #28595
    t/breaking 💥, area-xaml, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [net10.0, Testing] Enabled failed UITests for Switch control due to new OffColor API. #28495
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed incorrect tab content display in TabbedPage #27294
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fix for Shell custom FlyoutIcon display problem #27502
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed CollectionView throws NRE when value of IsGrouped property is changed to false #27331
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

    area-xaml

    area-architecture
  • [WiP] SafeArea #28556
    area-layout, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Android] Fixed ListView items height are not proper in initial loading with HasUnevenRows set as True. #26841
    community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix ListView.ScrollTo to Align SelectedItem with Center or End on Windows #26922
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion

    community ✨, area-controls-entry, partner/syncfusion

    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
